allow:
Bash(/tmp/verify_imports.txt << 'EOF'
CHECKING ALL IMPORTS FROM APP.JSX:

1. Context Providers:
   - AppProvider, useApp from ./contexts/AppContext
   - NotificationProvider, useNotifications from ./contexts/NotificationContext
   - DataProvider, useData from ./contexts/DataContext

2. Layout components:
   - LoginModal from ./components/auth/LoginModal
   - RegisterModal from ./components/auth/RegisterModal
   - Header from ./components/layout/Header
   - Sidebar from ./components/layout/Sidebar
   - ModuleTabBar from ./components/layout/ModuleTabBar
   - MobileBottomTabs from ./components/layout/MobileBottomTabs
   - AttendancePopup from ./components/shared/AttendancePopup
   - PermissionsModal from ./components/shared/PermissionsModal

3. Module imports:
   - MediaModule from ./modules/media
   - TechnicalModule from ./modules/technical
   - WarehouseModule from ./modules/warehouse
   - SalesModule from ./modules/sales
   - FinanceModule from ./modules/finance

4. Global modals:
   - CreateTaskModal from ./modules/media/CreateTaskModal
   - TaskModal from ./modules/media/TaskModal
   - CreateJobModal from ./modules/technical/CreateJobModal
   - JobDetailModal from ./modules/technical/JobDetailModal
EOF)
Bash(for dir in media technical warehouse sales finance)
